column22: long-description:"From Age of Empires co-creator Brian Sullivan and Braveheart writer Randall Wallace comes an innovative action role playing game set in ancient Greece
column23: Egypt and Asia. The Titans have escaped their eternal prison
column24:
wreaking havoc upon the earth. The gods seek a hero who can turn the tide in an epic struggle that will determine the fate of both men and gods. Are you ready for the quest?

Explore the Ancient World - Unlock arcane mysteries as you journey to legendary locations
Conquer Monsters of Legend - Battle mythical beasts in a story-driven campaign that will determine the fate of all existence
Highly Customizable Characters - Build and customize your characters with 28 classes and over 1000 pieces of unique and legendary items to create the ultimate champion
Online Multiplayer Gameplay - Challenge others to experience the story in fast-action
column25:
2-6 player online cooperative gameplay
Console controls & UI – Tailor made UI and controls for a perfect ARPG experience using a gamepad
